originalText.text: Worst organization. Probably a den of thieves. It’s very unorganized. No one really does their job here. It’s a disgrace for them to have an office by 42nd street. I’ve seen better organizations than this and it’s unprofessional. Don’t waste your time and save your time and money somewhere else.

text.text: Worst organization. Probably a den of thieves. It’s very unorganized. No one really does their job here. It’s a disgrace for them to have an office by 42nd street. I’ve seen better organizations than this and it’s unprofessional. Don’t waste your time and save your time and money somewhere else.

originalText.text:
I would like to express my experience as an employee for this company.

I had to resign from this hostile company.
I worked as a hands-on “Lead” Handyman at VIA and this past year, there was a few transitions in management for the building.
One of the managers ( John Christian)  hired people he knew and pressured the senior employees to do the labor work while the new employees ( John hired) would walk around with coffee cup in their hand with no experience, do nothing, and try to delegate to other employees. ( hired as handyman)
The assistant property manager Richard Ramirez, showed favoritism to a few of the handymen, and would call them to his office and hangout on company time on a daily basis. While the building work orders were piling up and apartments needs set up, and he would pressure me and assign me to do it.
Yes, this company is all about who you know and not how much you know.

I’m grateful, I have moved on to a company with professionalism and that appreciates my experience and knowledge!

If you are looking for career and professionalism this not the place.

originalText.text: Post jobs on the jobs board with no response. I have sent them my resume for jobs I was over, under and just rightly to qualified for.

originalText.text: DJ Parham is the most professional and exemplary leasing agent I have ever had the business of doing business with.
